dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
This project provides classes and utility functions for working with
read fast5 files. It provides an abstraction layer between the
underlying h5py library and the various concepts central to read fast5
files, such as "reads", "analyses", "analysis summaries", and "analysis
datasets". Ideally all interaction with a read fast5 file should be
possible via this API, without having to directly invoke the h5py
library.
dependent_to.name: py-ont-fast5-api

description: Text progress bar library for Python
name: py-progressbar33

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
